item.title: SSL: How to generate free SSL certificates with Certbot (Let's Encrypt)
item.description: Don’t know how to configure SSL certificate? Just started learning about how to deploy your own secure website but don’t want to spend money purchasing a SSL certificate? Let’s Encrypt (now Certbot) is here to save the day! Background Letâ€™s Encrypt is a free, automated, and open Certificate Authority. Let’s Encrypt is an official Certificate Authority. This means that the SSL certificate provided/generated by Let’s Encrypt is recognised by all browsers as being legitimate.
